clang-analyzer-fuchsia.HandleChecker.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-fuchsia.HandleChecker
A Checker that detect leaks related to Fuchsia handles.
The
clang-analyzer-fuchsia.HandleChecker
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-fuchsia.HandleChecker.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
